hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo id: $TEST_LINUX echo url: $TEST_LINUX_URL echo service id: $TEST_LINUX_SERVICE_ID echo tags: $TEST_LINUX_TAGS echo machine name: $TEST_LINUX_MACHINE_NAME echo public address: $TEST_LINUX_PUBLIC_ADDRESS echo private address: $TEST_LINUX_PRIVATE_ADDRESS
function assert_not_empty() { if [ -z "$2" ]; then echo "$1 is not available" exit 1; fi }
assert_not_empty TEST_LINUX $TEST_LINUX assert_not_empty TEST_LINUX_URL $TEST_LINUX_URL assert_not_empty TEST_LINUX_SERVICE_ID $TEST_LINUX_SERVICE_ID assert_not_empty TEST_LINUX_MACHINE_NAME $TEST_LINUX_MACHINE_NAME assert_not_empty TEST_LINUX_PUBLIC_ADDRESS $TEST_LINUX_PUBLIC_ADDRESS assert_not_empty TEST_LINUX_PRIVATE_ADDRESS $TEST_LINUX_PRIVATE_ADDRESS
if [ ${TEST_TAG} != $TEST_LINUX_TAGS ]; then echo TEST_LINUX_TAGS is not the same as TEST_TAG exit 1; fi
